attributes.action: Stop expensive plans for road tolls and increase tax on fuel. This is a more cost effective way of making the producer pay for environmental damage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop plans for road tolls and increase tax on fuel. This would be a cost effectivly method of allocating the environmental cost of transport on the producer. 

To reduce congestion use the tax from taxing fuel to significantly subsidise public transport. 

In rural areas expand linking post office & other local delivery services with bus services. Consider council tax rebates.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
